SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into od_system_survey (SYSTEM_NAME, SYSTEM_ADDR, SYSTEM_STATUS, SYSTEM_CONTRACTOR, INCHARGE_MAN, INCHARGE_TEL, MANAGER_DEPT, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_TEL, DATA_STATUS, SYSTEM_INTRODUCTION) values (#{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemContractor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inchargeMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inchargeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemIntroduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update od_system_survey set SYSTEM_NAME = #{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTEM_ADDR = #{systemAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTEM_STATUS = #{systemStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTEM_CONTRACTOR = #{systemContractor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCHARGE_MAN = #{inchargeMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCHARGE_TEL = #{inchargeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_DEPT = #{managerDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_NAME = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_TEL = #{managerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_STATUS = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTEM_INTRODUCTION = #{systemIntroduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SYSTEM_NAME, SYSTEM_ADDR, SYSTEM_STATUS, SYSTEM_CONTRACTOR, INCHARGE_MAN, INCHARGE_TEL, MANAGER_DEPT, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_TEL, DATA_STATUS, SYSTEM_INTRODUCTION from od_system_survey where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, SYSTEM_NAME, SYSTEM_ADDR, SYSTEM_STATUS, SYSTEM_CONTRACTOR, INCHARGE_MAN, INCHARGE_TEL, MANAGER_DEPT, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_TEL, DATA_STATUS, SYSTEM_INTRODUCTION from od_system_survey
